alternate_methods: You can apply direct to your local school or college.
introduction: You can fill out an online application form to register your interest in becoming a school or college governor. You'll hear back when there's a vacancy in your area.
more_information:
Your work as a governor can include:

- agreeing budgets, policies and objectives
- making sure budgets and objectives are being met
- reviewing the work of senior staff 
- helping to appoint staff

^You'll be entitled to time off work, but you might not get paid for being a governor.^
overview: Register your application to be a school or college governor - you can help decide how a local school or college is run
title: Become a school or college governor
will_continue_on: the School Governors’ One-Stop Shop website.
